ch.powerunit

Annotation Type Parameter


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Parameter
    Field marker (public non static field), for parameterized test.

    The field must be numbered (using value()) from 0 to n, in a continuous way.

    For example, a parameter field can be defined in the following way: 

     @Parameter(0)
 public String fieldName;
    Author:
    borettim
    See Also:
    Parameters

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      int value
      Define the parameter position.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean filter
      This attribute can be used to indicate that this parameter is to be used as a predicate to accept (or not) a test for execution with this parameter set.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract int value
        Define the parameter position.
        Returns:
        the parameter position (0-based).

      • filter

        public abstract boolean filter
        This attribute can be used to indicate that this parameter is to be used as a predicate to accept (or not) a test for execution with this parameter set.

        This is false by default and when set to true, only one field can it. This can only be used on field of type : 

         BiFunction<String,Object[],Boolean>
        This predicate will receive as parameter the test method name and the parameter array and should return true if and only if the test method should be run.
        Returns:
        the filtering status.
        Since:
        0.1.0
        See Also:
        BiFunction
        Default:
        false
